name: Chikkugotchi
description:
Chikku the happy chicken needs your help. She can't cook her own food, and don't know how to keep herself happy. Help her! Feed her different variations of food, and watch her play with the piano by placing the objects wherever you want in the built environment. Beware the edges! Chikku can fall of the edge, if she does, an endless fall into the abyss awaits. 

Requires a smartphone with support for Google ARCore.

A 4-week school project for VR/AR cource at YRGO
